The physical abuse suffered by Ethan Hau: resulting in multiple blunt force injuries and hypothermia, as stated by the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Office.
The punishment ordered by Timothy Hausch: which required Ethan to carry a heavy wooden log weighing approximately two-thirds his body weight, as reported by Damian Hauschultz.

The confirmation sought from the Manitow: s Office regarding the details of the case and the circumstances leading to Ethan and his siblings being placed under Timothy Hauschultz's supervision.
